Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.event.request

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRequestEvent
    Requests events are events sent only by the model The view is expected to reply with an appropriate view event, passing parameters that were present in the request if needed
    AbstractRequestWorkerInteractEvent
    Events that relate to a worker interacting with a given coordinate
    RequestPlayerChallengerSelectFirstEvent
    Request a PlayerChallengerSelectFirstEvent response from the player
    RequestPlayerChallengerSelectGodsEvent
    Request a PlayerChallengerSelectGodsEvent response from the player
    RequestPlayerChooseGodEvent
    Request a PlayerChooseGodEvent response from the player
    RequestPlayerEndTurnEvent
    Request a PlayerEndTurnEvent from the player The player may send another view event if the related request was sent between this and a previous non-request event Notify the player about being able to end the turn This event is sent after every other request during the "on going" game state to signal that no other requests are coming
    RequestPlayerPingEvent
    Request a PlayerPingEvent from the player The response will be used to determine whether or not the player is still connected This event is not related to other request events and can always be replied to This event is handled by the VirtualView and therefore does not pass through the ModelEventProvider
    RequestWorkerBuildBlockEvent
    Request a WorkerBuildBlockEvent from the player The player may send another view event if the related request was sent between this and a previous non-request event
    RequestWorkerBuildDomeEvent
    Request a RequestWorkerBuildDomeEvent from the player The player may send another view event if the related request was sent between this and a previous non-request event
    RequestWorkerForceEvent
    Request a RequestWorkerForceEvent from the player The player may send another view event if the related request was sent between this and a previous non-request event
    RequestWorkerMoveEvent
    Request a RequestWorkerMoveEvent from the player The player may send another view event if the related request was sent between this and a previous non-request event
    RequestWorkerSpawnEvent
    Request a RequestWorkerSpawnEvent from the player The player may send another view event if the related request was sent between this and a previous non-request event
